games.title: RO:CK VR
games.description: Become a virtual reality monkey, swing around using a vine, and take revenge on the cavemen that ate your family.

games.title: Gun to the Power of Gun
games.description: This game allows players to attach guns they pick up onto their current gun, leading to a huge variety of gun monstrosities.

games.title: Bartholomew Bone's Adventure
games.description: A zombie adventure game featuring multiple different AI agents, four unique weapons, sliceable zombie limbs, and a final boss fight.

games.title: Hell NO
games.reason: BIGA $5000 Mini Game Challenge Submission (3rd Place Winner)
games.description: Play as a little spirit trying to escape hell by stacking objects on top of each other, while scheming poltergeists try to knock you down.

games.title: Jambulance
games.description: Navigate an ambulance through a heavy traffic jam to get your patient to the hospital before they die. Try not to explode along the way!

games.title: RELEASE THE MEAT
games.description: Create the perfect cart, fill it up with meat, and bring it to the end of the level while trying to keep as much meat inside as you can.
